title: Can't Select a Champ in Champ Select

embed.description: The easy way to save screenshots, GIFs, and websites. Make everyone happy by sharing smarter, faster, and with your point crystal clear.

body: Went into a normal blind queue and ended up with this. Everything was normal but the area to select champs was blanked out; forced me to dodge.

replies.body:
Hmmmm looks like your connection had some unfortunate hiccup and wasn't able to grab the list of champions you owned from the servers. Your network needs to be able to get that information, otherwise it can't display what champions you can choose. which can result in those sucky dodges when you never meant to. 

Do me a favor and update some of your settings using this [**network settings**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide. The steps in there cover the basics, but do be sure to run through those no matter how trivial they might seem. It's always good to cover your bases, but let me know if this doesn't seem to help in the future.
